1.name: MOP attribute -Advance automatically to day after holiday
1.description: payment will be processed and sent out to clearing. Value date is not effected by this checkbox

2.name: MOP attribute -Advance automatically to day after holiday
2.description: payment value date will rollover to the next business date.

3.name: MOP attribute -  Cutoff
3.description: Processing time is compared to default clearing cutoff defined in the MOP profile

4.name: MOP attribute -  Cutoff
4.description: Processing time is compared to clearing cutoff selected via rule

5.name: MT selection
5.description: GPP will send MT103/ MT202 via EURO1

6.name: MT selection
6.description: GPP will send MT103 via EURO1

7.name: MT selection
7.description: GPP will send MT103PLS via EURO1

8.name: MT selection
8.description: GPP will send MT103PLS via EURO1

9.name: MOP attribute - MOP currency
9.description: EURO1 won’t be selected as MOP

10.name: MOP attribute - MOP currency
10.description: EURO1 will be assessed and might be selected as MOP (depending on additional criteria in MOP selection process)

11.name: MOP attribute - MOP selected by user
11.description: EURO1 can be selected manually as credit MOP

12.name: MOP attribute - MOP Force from schedule Q
12.description: User can force the payment out of schedule Q

13.name: MOP attribute - MOP  FIN copy
13.description: FIN copy name EBA is embedded at field 103 at block 3 in the SWIFT message

14.name: MOP FIN copy
14.description: The source MOP is identified by finding a MOP with the same FIN copy service from the message

15.name: MOP attribute - MOP Identifier
15.description: The settlement account of EURO1 will be credited.  In the outgoing SWIFT message that will be sent through EURO1, block 1 will be populated with the office identifier (BIC).

16.name: MOP attribute - MOP Identifier
16.description: The settlement account of the MOP will be debited

17.name: MOP attribute - ACK/Confirmation
17.description: The message is sent to Complete queue, as no 012/019 is expected

18.name: MOP attribute - ACK/Confirmation
18.description: Message is sent to Wait Confirmation to await 012/019

19.name: MOP attribute - Membership required
19.description: EURO1 will be assessed and might be selected as MOP (depending on additional criteria in MOP selection process)

20.name: MOP attribute - Membership required
20.description: EURO1 won’t be selected as MOP

21.name: MOP attribute -Membership type
21.description: GPP will set the bank as first in credit chain and will send the payment through EURO1

22.name: MOP attribute -Membership type
22.description: GPP will send the payment to the destination bank via EURO1

23.name: MOP attribute -Membership -BIC 8
23.description: The search should continue with the first 8 characters of the BIC, and if a membership is found, then the BIC11 is considered as a member of Euro1

24.name: MOP attribute -Membership -Add member to chain
24.description: The BIC is not added to the credit chain, and only the original, destination bank’s BIC, stays in the message
